QuestData.Title: Nobundo's Last Stand
QuestData.Description: The Exodar shook from the force of the Legion's arrival. Before we could react, demons were running rampant through the halls, slaughtering everything in their path. If it were not for the Prophet, we would have all perished in the initial assault.$B$BI was charged with evacuating the Crystal Hall, which is when my Broken and I were separated from the main force.$B$BWe fell back into the collapsed hall to make our last stand.$B$BWith your aid, we may survive this invasion.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Defend Farseer Nobundo from the Legion Assault
QuestData.LogDescription: Defend Farseer Nobundo from the Legion Assault.
QuestData.RewardText: You have my thanks, and the gratitude of the Broken, hero. Many would have considered us an acceptable loss, yet you have shown us great compassion and kindness. An act that I - we - will not soon forget.$B$BNow we will return to the Vault of Lights and assist Velen as best we can.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Nobundo to begin the assault
